description.zh: Morphic 是一个由人工智能驱动的搜索引擎，具备生成式用户界面，支持使用自然语言进行智能搜索。它兼容多种搜索和AI服务提供商，具备灵活的集成与部署选项。项目设计注重可定制性，可通过 Docker、Vercel 或 Cloudflare Pages 部署。
description.en: Morphic is an AI-powered search engine with a generative UI that allows users to perform intelligent searches using natural language. It supports multiple search and AI providers, enabling flexible integration and deployment options. Designed for customization, it can be deployed via Docker, Vercel, or Cloudflare Pages.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供用于AI搜索体验的可定制生成式用户界面
- 支持多种AI和搜索提供商，具备灵活性与可扩展性
- 提供通过 Docker、Vercel 或 Cloudflare Pages 的便捷部署选项

## 功能列表:

- 基于生成式UI的AI搜索功能
- 自然语言问题理解能力
- 支持多个搜索提供商（Tavily、SearXNG、Exa）
- 通过UI选择AI模型（在可用模型间切换）
- 支持推理模型并显示思考过程
- 基于 Supabase Auth 的用户认证
- 支持邮箱/密码注册与登录
- 支持通过 Google 的社交登录
- 聊天历史功能（可选）
- 搜索结果分享（可选）
- 支持 Redis（本地/Upstash）
- 支持多种AI提供商，包括 OpenAI、Google Generative AI、Azure OpenAI、Anthropic、Ollama、Groq、DeepSeek、Fireworks、xAI（Grok）和兼容OpenAI的接口
- 支持URL定向搜索
- 视频搜索支持（可选）
- 集成 SearXNG，支持自定义搜索深度、引擎、结果数量限制、安全搜索和时间范围过滤
- 支持Docker部署
- 浏览器搜索引擎集成
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers a customizable and generative UI for AI-powered search experiences
- Supports multiple AI and search providers for flexibility and scalability
- Easy deployment options with Docker, Vercel, or Cloudflare Pages

## Features:

- AI-powered search with GenerativeUI
- Natural language question understanding
- Multiple search providers support (Tavily, SearXNG, Exa)
- Model selection from UI (switch between available AI models)
- Reasoning models with visible thought process
- User authentication powered by Supabase Auth
- Email/Password sign-up and sign-in
- Social Login with Google
- Chat history functionality (Optional)
- Share search results (Optional)
- Redis support (Local/Upstash)
- Support for various AI providers including OpenAI, Google Generative AI, Azure OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama, Groq, DeepSeek, Fireworks, xAI (Grok), and OpenAI Compatible
- URL-specific search
- Video search support (Optional)
- SearXNG integration with customizable search depth, engines, results limit, safe search, and time range filtering
- Docker deployment ready
- Browser search engine integration
